itemInfo.itemDesc:
A nicely cooked lizard kebab. 

- Unique Effect: Max Stamina +100 for 45 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Red Sauce
item.desc:
A red sauce used for Cooking.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Steak, Cheese Gratin

item.name: Lizard Meat
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a lizard corpse.

item.name: Wheat
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by a variety of methods.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Costa Farm, Moretti Plantation, and Northern Wheat Plantation. It can also be obtained by Farming Wheat Seeds using a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, Vinegar, etc.

item.name: Onion
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Oatmeal, Stir-Fried Meat, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Onion Seeds in a Garden.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.

item.name: Red Sauce
item.desc:
A red sauce used for Cooking.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Steak, Cheese Gratin
